title: Sleepy Time Valerian Tea
description: A calming bedtime tea to support sleep onset.
instructions: Steep 1 tsp dried valerian root in hot water for 10–15 minutes. Sweeten if desired.

title: Anti-Inflammatory Golden Milk
description: Warming turmeric latte for joints and digestion.
instructions: Simmer milk with turmeric, pinch of black pepper, and ginger for 5 minutes.
